alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 3:23AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central St. Louis and northern Lake Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 322 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Fall Lake, to 6 miles north of Babbitt, to 13 miles north of Fairbanks, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Winton around 335 AM CDT. Fall Lake and Birch Lake around 340 AM CDT. Basswood Lake and Forest Center around 345 AM CDT. Snowbank Lake around 350 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Ensign Lake, Hudson Lake, Bald Eagle Lake, Gabbro Lake, Thomas Lake, Alice Lake, Ojibway Lake, Farm Lake, Fourtown Lake and Bear Head Lake State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake
